level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 11 of Toll Telecommunications Service Tax Temporary Act of 1989 (D.C. Law 8-4, May 23, 1989, law notification 36 DCR 4154).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-26
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-26, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3901.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."
